item.title: Photo
item.category: hello!! how are you doing? c:
I'm fine! I'm not sure if my chestnut trees are fine too they all have developed brown leaves
I don't know yet if it's death or just autumn
I'm enjoying the free semester break
even though there is still one more class to come
and I'm not looking forward to it because last week I noticed something about the cafeterias decoration and I can't stop thinking about it
you know we have these really cute posters that show cartoon characters holding hands
like on the posters are just hands
and in the cafeteria is that cute drawing of donald duck and spiderman holding hands
there is also something written under them but I never manged to read it because its tiny
and its really cute and everything
but lately I've been thinking
on the poster spiderman and donald duck have the same hand size
which means that in this interpretation donald duck is as tall as spiderman right?
according to the marvel wiki spiderman is 5 feet and 10 inches
which is 1m 78cm
which means donald duck is 5 feet 10 inches tall as well
and thats already terrible
but you know whats really bad
Goofy is in almost every cartoon 2 times as tall as Donald is
that means according to the cute gay spiderman/donald poster goofy is 11 feet 3 inches tall
thats 3m 50cm
thats just thats way too much goofy
goofy could be in your lawn and look into the second floor of your house without any struggle
just imagine the size of his teeth
maybe thats what the tiny text says

item.title: Photo
item.category: selfie bee
this is about my big fear i feel about meeting an actually super sweet friend in the subway because her birthday was like 3 weeks ago and an
other friend of mine gave me a present for her because I live closer to her but then i fogot it in another city and I couldn't rescue is yet
I can visit the present tomorrow but until then I'm hiding
how are you doing? c:
I think I kind of forgot how to walk in socks
it's the first time I am wearing socks in weeks and everything is so slippery
especially the last three steps on the staircase!
i've tried changing the socks but it did not change anything
except the socks
of couse I could just not wear any but it's really cold even though its still summer holiday time here
I hope if you are having summer break right now you aren't too said about the weather
maybe the rest will be better!! I think you have 2 more weeks?
I walked by the elementary school today and there was light in the bathroom
once while I went to that school there was one summer break where a wild hog ran full speed into the bathroom door and then it died
so that was probably the hog ghost
I hope its not bored during the summer break with no one to spook
this is such an evil bathroom
I do not know the circumstances but 2 years or so ago there was a sign on the bathroom door with a lot of that 'do not cross!!" tape
and the sign read 'wasp protection zone'
I still think about that a lot
I think I've read once that in autumn all wasps die and only the queen survives
so maybe the hog ghost has 300 wasp ghost friends
I hope I'll never find out
have a nice day everyone :)

item.title: Hi there! Me and my best friend/roommate have been reading and...
item.description:
Hi there! Me and my best friend/roommate have been reading and loving your dragon bros comics for years! We’re even in each other’s phones as “Chestopher” and “Squadrick” and so we decided to customize some sweatshirts today to pay homage to our favorite dragons! Thanks so much for making the comics- they always make us laugh!!!

THEY ARE SO CUTE YOU ARE SO CUTE YOU TWO WEARING MUST BE MAXIMUM CUTE (๑ˊ͈ ॢꇴ ˋ͈)〜♡॰ॱ

This is the most amazing bro-fashion! It’s absolutely something the two would wear, they look so soft and comfy! Thank you for making these two a little part of your great friendshp. And thanks so for showing me, it really made my day! I wish you both a wonderful weekend （*´▽｀*）
item.category: AWESOME PEOPLE BEING AWESOME
IT'S SO CUTE
iwantyourovaries
I think the 'roommate' shirt is really kind of cool but i've never had a roommate so it would be a lie shirt
the mannequin is gone!!
I am not sure yet if this points to it being haunted or it being not haunted
I can't really imagine the waste glass people taking it with them
It didn't look very much like waste glass
no matter how many egg cups I put away daily I always find a new one somewhere on my desk
I do not eat that many eggs
maybe I just think that I put them away and then I don't
and then I forget about them and I just think it's a new egg cup every time
I wish you all a fun weekend! c:
submission

item.title: Photo
item.category: selfie bee
semester break starts tomorrow!! c:
and then it's my mothers birthday and then it's my uncles birthday and there will be endless cake
it will be great
also I think I saw a haunted mannequin today
I wanted to take the bus to the city because I needed wrapping paper without christmas motives on them
and also something to wrap
and at the bus stop there was a fully dressed mannequin at the waste glass container at the bus stop
I think that's pretty haunted
a man walking his dog made eye contact with her and then started running
but she was wearing a really cute outfit so she's probably very nice when she haunts you
always offering you tissue paper and a half of her sandwhich
but on the sandwitch is a really big slice of that smelly pink sausage so you say no but it's still really sweet of her to ask
she even had that nice girl haircut you know that long bob
next month is the our first high school reunion
I hope until then I managed to make a doctor appoinment about that wart on my finger
but I know of at least one person from my class who also got a wart on her finger since graduation
so maybe that's a thing

item.title: Photo
item.category: harry potter
sorry for the long silence everyone!! o(；△；)o
I had to make a book presentation and the person I was supposed to do the presentation with fought with the professor and then she didn't wa
nt to do it anymore and then I had to read 3000 books about how 3 people
standing in a room actually represent jesus
I think the presentation turned out okay!! c: the professor ran out during it because he forgot his own book but he came back
and that what I was doing the last weeks
and I had a cough and made really bad cookies
the recipe said that the cookies were supposed to be in the oven for only 5 minutes but I didn't trust that
there were 3 eggs inside
3 eggs feel to dangerous to only put them in the oven for 5 minutes
so left them in for 50 minutes
which sort of completly burned them
but they were also still soft
it was really sad because I sacrificed an entire bag of cherries for them
maybe this is the reason why my mother gets so nervous every time I say that I can totally bake all the cakes for her birthday
I hope you were having a good time as well! (:

item.title: Photo
item.category: dragon bros
there is a thunderstorm outside!!
it so cool!!
it has been very hot all day so its a nice refreshing :)
I haven't got my pencil back
but I also forgot how the person looked like who I borrowed it so I just hope it has a nice new home
I googled grapefruits did you know that they have a lot of vitamin C
I only drank grapefruit juice once and it was the worst time I ever had with juice
It looks so fun and then you taste it and everything is sad
my mom likes it but she is pretty hardcore
you know the most mysterious thing happened yesterday
I woke up and the floor was covered in tiny balls
tiny metal balls
they were everywhere
and I assumed that they somehow came from our hallway renovation because I don't know
so vacuumed them away
hours later I see more and more tiny metal balls
but I see no tiny metal balls in the hallway
so I investigated
and you know what it was
it was the tape dispender!!
somehow the tape dispender broke at it's base and it was filled with tiny metal balls
I fixed it with well tape
but I'm not really over this yet
are all tape dispenders filled with metal balls
who makes them
what else was filled with tiny metal balls the whole time
I forgot the white dragons nostril again
I hope you are having a nice day
my marmelade didn't really get hard

item.title: Photo
item.category: selfie bee
I'm sorry to everyone who I have every texted 'how are you' and then never replied
also sorry to everyone who had my number during that one phase I had where I would text people rat pictures I found on the internet
I just thought they were cute
you know yesterday was the second time someone told me about the
terrible presentation someone held in professor b's class last semester
you know
the one I held
I think I made a D: face because halfway she realized that it was me and changed the topic to her book club
sounded like a really nice book club though
also I think the boy next to me in that class stole my pen
it wasn't really stealing he whispered 'PEN?' and I gave him a pen
he never said he would give it back
but we were watching a series about a brave dog in that class and it was really captivating so I can see why we both forgot about the pen
it was Lassie!! Do you know Lassie
she's that brave dog and every episode she saves some child from drowning
aw man I really liked that pen
I once thought that someone had stolen my flute when I was in elementary school and cried the whole time and at the end of the day it had be
en on the kitchen table the whole time
I hated that flute
why can't be my pen at the kitchen table
also my father is renovating the hallway
which is pretty cool because our old dog ate a lot of the paint from the walls
but he is also putting in a new ceiling
and for that he is removing the old ceiling
which has been in there for 25 years
that is 25 years of dead spiders in the ceiling
he is a strong man

item.title: Photo
item.category: selfie bee
I'm sorry that the content on this blog hasn't have much variety lately :c I felt a bit art blocked recently but I think I'm over it
I think it was because university was so relaxed recently
when I have too much free time I just do the Sims 3 100 baby challenge over and over
but yesterday I finally went to the professor who I thought had lost my paper!! do you remember??
turned out that it was in his g folder the entire time
he said that the g stands for 'not read'
in german language it does not make sense either but he was so nice and sweet and apologized a lot and then I apologized a lot and then he s
aid that he liked foxes and I said I also liked foxes and he is the nicest professor ever
years ago we had baby foxes living in the field in front of our house that was awesome c:
there also was a swan once but they are mean
too powerful
too many teeth
And I cleaned up my desk
drawers yesterday and found so much old art and for some reason when I was 13 I exclusively drew girls with cabbage heads
there also was a terrible poem about a girl with a cabbage head
was mostly about how she was sad about having a cabbage head

item.title: Photo
item.category: harry potter
drawing draco always makes me a little nervous I feel like every moment he will turn his head to me and make fun of my hair
when I was a child my best friend had a big brother who was allowed to buy teenager magazines and after he read them we were allowed to read
them and one day there was a tom felton 'autograph' included and I was so jealous of it
she kept it kind of hidden at her bedside but since was this around the Chamber of Secret movie his yellow hair was so bright it shined dire
ctly into my heart
CoS was such a cool book c: I have the headcanon that after the events Lucius was so embarrsed of the whole thing
he didn't tell anyone that dobby got free he just started to secretly do all of the housework
but he was really bad at it and always burned the food and washed the clothes too hot
and everybody kind of knew but never said anything
until one day they just sat down and decided together that dobby was dead and then they never talked about it again
I love that Draco continued naming his child after
sort of reptily animals
a scorpion is not really a reptile I'm sorry
actually it's probably very far away from a reptile
but how else can you express it
I can't say mythological animals I am pretty sure scorpions are real
actually maybe dragons and scorpions have nothing in common at all
but it just feels like it
like roaches
I hope Scorpius names his son Roach

item.title: Photo
item.category: dragon bros
this is the only version where the dragon has a nostril in the last panel
I saw it too late on instagram and facebook
the shame
I saw the dog who ate a pen again today!!
He fell asleep and class and then he yawned and waddled with his legs
I love him
I remember nothing else from that class
I'm going to make a rasperry cake tomorrow!!
I think I like rasperrys more than strawberries
because they grow up tall and you don't have to rob in the dirt to get them
I think that's nice of them!
we also have some blackberries in the garden
in theory at least
because my father build a garage on them
they do not see the sun
that's why I planted my chestnuts in pots and not in the garden
I fear my father would build a garage on them
you know in the fantastic beasts movie
the first time we see tina
you know when she's listening to the second salemers in front of the bank
while reading a newspaper and looking totally unsuspicios
you know in that moment she's eating a hot dog
and then 2 seconds later we see her in the bank and she is spying on Newt
her hot dog is gone!!!
the entire hot dog!!!
I don't think that she could eat an ENTIRE hot dog in that amount of time
it was still a full hot dog
where did it go tina
maybe she just put it into her pocket

item.title: Hello May 31 anon!! This is the 4rth picture already, isn’t it?...
item.description: Hello May 31 anon!! This is the 4rth picture already, isn’t it? Time really flies! I hope it was a good year for you ₍՞◌′ᵕ‵ू◌₎♡
item.category: may 31th anon
cw suicide
gnaww I still love these two
but I have to confess that I still haven't watched the latest episode
first I had a bad cold and then the dog was a boy all along and now I don't know
I got a new tip for my pen!! for the first time ever!! c:
it's pretty cool it's one of those felt tips
I didn't knew it was a felt tip when I got it
I didn't even knew there were felt tips
this is just like when I was 12 and really wanted to watch edward scissorhands and then accidently bought a blue ray disc because I didn't k
new what they were and just thought it was a cool looking blue DVD cover
we didn't have a blue ray player
no one has ever watched that disc
I think we ended up storing it in a kitchen cabinet for six years
and then we renovated the kitchen and now it's gone
got it on DVD eventually
I saw the best thing last sunday!
there was a mom and a dad and a baby and the dad was eating a sandwhich
and the mom had the baby strapped to her chest
and the mom wanted a bite of the sandwhich as well so the dad like put it into her face
and she took a bite
and then the entire salad fell out of the sandwhich
onto the baby
the entire baby was full of salad
but it had a great time
I aspire to be that baby
just with less salad on my head

item.title: Photo
item.category: harry potter
DID YOU KNOW THAT BEZOARS ARE REAL
THEY ARE!!!
I WANTED TO GOOGLE THE SPELLING AND THEN I FOUND ARTICLES ON THEM
it's those balls cats and birds cough out when they have eaten little prey animals and they can't dissolve their bones and hair!!
so since the harry potter wizards only mention goat Bezoars that either means that they live in a twisted world where goats prey on mice
or that WE live in a world where goats prey on mice
D:
a goat bit my hand at a petting zoo once and I just thought that it wanted to have the goat snacks in my hand
BUT MAYBE I HAD BEEN THE SNACK
I'm too afraid to google and further
but I went to the doctor to get my ear saved
it was pretty scary because I was the 4rth person in line at the doctors office
and all those people went in the doctor room
but no one came out
turned out that he had a second door in his room that went outside
but those were some stressful ten minutes of waiting
but my ear is happy again and so am I c:

item.title: hi franzi <3i’m making a patch with squadrick for my...
item.description:
hi franzi <3

i’m making a patch with squadrick for my friend’s birthday and thought you might like to know that

it’s extra hard to embroider scales.

(also THANK YOU for making these characters my friend and i adore them.)

HE’S SO TINY AND BEAUTIFUL ヽ(´∇｀)ﾉ

Thanks so much for sharing! I’m impressed how you caught the scribble-looking look of the original with the different sized scales and horns in a medium that’s so difficult to control! And aaah the scales are so round , how did you do that? Many super tiny stiches? It looks like you put a lot of love and time into this, I’m sure your friend was thrilled! (*＾v＾*) Your art style makes him look so beautiful and dainty with his pointy and elegant claw! Every dragon would be lucky to hold an adorable claw like that ₍՞◌′ᵕ‵ू◌₎♡

Thanks so much for submitting, it’s really cute and made me very happy! Have a nice day! :)
item.category: Submission
platinum-boomerang
AWESOME PEOPLE BEING AWESOME
I smell so hard like onions right now
I sort of poked my right ear to death with a qtip
again
and the local doctor is already closed
and on the internet it said put an onion on your ear and it will heal
now I have a hurt ear and smell like onions
I would recommend to not trust the internet on onion related health tips
trust your doctor
our village doctor is pretty cool he once did CPR on a dog
the dog still died but at least he tried I guess
remember those chestnuts I planted last winter? two of them are growing now!! c:
but yesterday when I checked on them they had vine fretters
I brushed them off but know the little trees are looking a little sad
I'm sorry trees
I wonder if they want some onions
but maybe this is just how baby trees look after rain?
I think I'll put the big one in a bigger pot
I wish school would teach us about caring for baby trees
and less latin
submission

item.title: Photo
item.category: harry potter
of course hermione had great hair in all books
but that yule ball scene was so important to me
I always imagined my prom to be like that
but then it wasn't because I accidently got the most poofy and sparkly dress on purpose
it even had poofy roses
and the hair dresser had tried to do something cool with loose strands of hair hanging out of the main hair
but I was so sweaty in that dress that those loose strands turned into sweat antennas in then minutes
glittery sweat antennas
I was grace
you know the hall we had our prom in is also the hall were our cities anime convention is held in every year
it's a good place
prom was really fun! c:
but I think there is a reason why mother never put up the pictures on the wall
the reason is poofy and sweaty

item.title: Photo
item.category: selfie bee
a quality post after a like 2 week long break
hello friends!! how are you? c:
the new semester has started and it's awesome
I'm taking a course about dogs
it turned out that I cannot actually like use the course but I love it too much to stop
yesterday there was a REAL dog in the class and it ate a pencil and then it made BLEBLEBLE
he is a good boy
and I finally went to the dentist after I forgot my appointmet!
the dentist said that I need to stop brushing my teeth so hard because I sort of brushed away my teeth flesh
I feel like teeth flesh is not the right vocabulary for it
sometimes things are so scary in english
I remember being in grade six and we read a text in our english textbook and it was a story about one kid watching her younger brother
and then the child says to the brother
'Brother! Keep your eyes peeled!'
and the class just
revolted
turned out that this means keep your eyes open
VERY open
it was one of the better stories in the book
the rest were all about that kid coming back from space camp and then she gets bullied because the other kids were jealous
that was never resolved in the next book they just all build a treehouse and then the treehouse fell out of the tree
and they had that pet turtle that was part helicopter and that was never explained
I want to keep my teeth flesh :c
but I also want to clean my teeth with POWER
and they renovated the university libary
I got very lost in the university libary yesterday

item.title: Photo
item.category: harry potter
gendered slurs
sexual language
happy easter time everyone! c:
I remember being so upset about Krum having a buzz cut
but their cool dance with the sticks and the fire made up for it
the butterfly thing was also cool but it would have been better if they had been on fire
when I was in elementary school a kid in my class said they had a pet butterfly but she also said that she had dug it up in the garden so it
probably wasn't true but now she has a horse so I think things worked out for her
I went to sind karaoke with her once but there were not enough microphones so I just sang into my hand pretending that I held one
it did not make it less awkward
I got some bunny stickers for easter to put on things
In the store they looked super cute because they have a little cotton ball glued on their butt
now that I have put the stickers on presents I have noticed that the sticker makers have marked the place to put the cotton balls with a lit
tle dot
but sadly the cotton ball isn't really glued on the dot but a little next to it
what I am saying is that the bunnies are having giant buttholes
happy easter grandma

item.title: Photo
item.category: selfie bee
it's almost time to dye eggs for easter!!
I think I will try to stay to the basics this year because last year I tried to get a super deep colour and left them in the dye too long
which dissolved the eggs shell a little but it was okay you just had to be very nice to them
and the year before that I tried to do a cool gradient and rolled the eggs in ALL THE DIE and it made them all look so dirty and my grandma
was so disgusted
not in a mean way more like worried
'did you meant to do that child'
I said yes because I was ashamed but I think it just confused people more
one time when my mom and dad were young my mom painted an egg for him with nail polish because she wanted to give him a really pretty egg fo
r decoration
and my dad was really happy about his shiny egg
and immediately ate it
and got really sick because the egg was soaked in entire bottle of nailpolish
I think this year they are just giving each other some socks

item.title: Photo
item.category: harry potter
all this advertising for the new smurfs movie is bringing back so many conflicting memories
do you know those terrible haribo gummy smurfs
our school had a kiosk that sold those
and it was run by middle schoolers
probably to teach us something about economis or something
but in reality we all just dreamed of the power to be in charge of 200 gummy smurfs
so one day I was a middle schooler and the day arrived our class would be running the kiosk
we were split into groups of 3 and every group then had 2 weeks of smurf duty
and it was intense
all the kids just stuck their arms into the kiosk window and screamed for smurfs
but the thing was that we had but the smurf bucket very close to the window
because we didn't really think this through
and one day we noticed we made too little money compared to the smurfs that were missing
and I got so scared
because I had been at the window that day and feared that I had given a kid a smurf without collecting money for it
and with the money we were supposed to go to a class trip
I put 2 Euro extra into the money jar to cover up for the crime but word got around and we had to have a class conference about this and
during the next break out group met up at the kiosk and that one kid Josie just said 'You know that i've been eating the smurfs right'
and another kid then said 'Yeah i've been eating the smurfs too'
turned out that everybody had been eating the smurfs
I wish I could tell you I stayed on the path of truthfulness but in the next break I ate a lollipop before the kiosk opened
at least it wasn't a smurf
and you know what two years later the kiosk was closed and turned into a shop that sold school shirts and stuff
crime ruins everything

item.title: Photo
item.category: harry potter
I handed in my last sociology paper ever in today!! I'm free!! :)))))
that means if I pass
but I have researched so many things like for example if you are in germany and a wolf eats your cat you can go to the gouvernment and ask t
o be paid back in natural produces
but you need to proof that it was a wolf
then you get like I dont know
3 potatoes
I don't think any cats have been eaten yet or if the law has been passed yet
but I will let you know if there are any news
I think I'll miss the sociology classes a little it was pretty interesting sometimes and they have the coolest building and one time a nice
girl gave me an orange
it didn't even have pits in it
was a great orange
I have never seen her again after that but in that lecture was also a husky
I got a D in that course
I also missed a dentist appointment this week :c
I thought it was next month but then it wasn't
I haven't been brave enough yet to call the dentist to apologize and make a new one
they have this giant glass wall with orchids at the reception
and it's so threatening
there is also text printed on the orchid saying stuff like
'NEVER FIGHT IS WILL MAKE YOU SAD AND YOU HAVE GOD INSIDE YOU'
they are really good dentists
but I don't trust the orchid
back in the day they just had a drawer and if you were a kid you could get small toy out of it after your appointment
I once got 3 tiny screwdivers
they are amazing
I think I call them monday
I finished the giant coke today and I think my teeth now need all the help they can get

item.title: Hey so I recently found your blog and it’s amazing I love it and...
item.description:
Hey so I recently found your blog and it’s amazing I love it and so i made human versions of the dragon bros as well as selfie bee and a lil drawing of fucking nancy as well
sorry I am trash and bad at drawing byeee(>^ω^

SO MANY DRAWINGS WHERE DO I START I LOVE THEM ALL ʕ •́؈•̀ ₎

Thank you so much for your submission! There are so many cool things! I really love your take on the human dragon bros, in dragon form the two look pretty similar so it must have been difficult to come up with something that is both creative and sitll recognizable. I think you found a great way to do it! With paying so much attention to the details - I really like how the dragons scales are pattern on the shirt and how the scales twirl on Squadricks tail they still look very dragon-y and characters very recognizable. I also love that you weren’t afraid to make them look different. I love Chestophers belly sticking out, how cute ♡´･ᴗ･`♡ Nancy and the bee also look super cool . The expressions are 100% spot on while still showing your own style. You have a knack for using very fitting body language for their facial expression. I hope having a knack means the thing I hope it means. I am trying to say that it looks good ᕕ( ᐛ )ᕗ

No drawing that you enjoyed drawing is bad. It takes courage to post art on the internet since it’s something always something personal, so please be proud both of your art and your guts. Also your signature is super cute never change it （*´▽｀*）

Thanks so much for showing it to me, I hope you have a nice day! C:
item.category: AWESOME PEOPLE BEING AWESOME
kitten-with-too-many-ships
this is embarassing but I had to google which one was named squadrick
and I found two dragon bro fanfictions
this is so cool :')
they are full of puns and love
I want to draw them again so much
I'm currently writing a billion papers for university but I hope I'll soon find time to draw more bad puns
thank you for sticking around even if this blog gets a littel quiet sometimes :)
do you remember the 1L 'XXL AMERICAN' canned coke my father got me for christmas?
I started drinking it on Monday
there is still so much inside
and it's so sweet
maybe this is why these papers are still not finished
drinking this can takes up at least 5 hours every day
and yesterday there was this enourmous fly on my desk
and I haven't seen it yet today
I fear
have a nice day everyone c:
submission
